title: Episode 228: The Words and Numbers Trio Pt. 1
itunes:title: Episode 228: The Words and Numbers Trio Pt. 1
description:
Clark Neily, Rob McDonald, and Howard Baetjer join us for the first of a multi-part free-wheeling conversation on government, history, and economics.

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!

http://www.cooperationandcoercion.com

Show Your Support for Words & Numbers at Patreon
